Setting the Session Timeout Value

The timeout value is the number of minutes of inactivity that are allowed before the Device Manager session is ended. You can configure timeout for the Admin and Guest accounts.

To configure session timeout:

 1. Choose Administration > Session Timeout.

 2. In the Administrator Inactivity Timeout field, enter the number, in minutes, before a session times out due to inactivity. Choose Never to allow the administrator to stay logged in permanently.

 3. In the Guest Inactivity Timeout field, enter the number, in minutes, before a session times out due to inactivity. Choose Never to allow the administrator to stay logged in permanently.

 4. Click Save.
